scripts.deploy-production: npm run package && echo 'uploading to PRODUCTION...' && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:612297603577:function:shutterbug --zip-file fileb://package.zip
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run package && echo 'uploading to STAGING...' && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:612297603577:function:shutterbug-staging --zip-file fileb://package.zip
scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
